data.actual_result: The Games tab will either not appear or still appear after changing your setting for it until you switch to another area of Discord
data.expected_result: The Games tab should correctly reflect your currently toggled setting for it without needing to switch to another area of Discord
data.short_description: Toggling Show Games Tab on or off while in a DM or your Friends List will not update it properly until you switch to another area of Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into your Friends List - Go into your User Settings -> Appearance - Change your Show Games Tab preference to on or off (depending on what you had it set beforehand) - Exit out of your User Settings and observe
